STUDY.APPROVAL_HINT: Please inform the study coordinator whether you approve or reject the study. If you reject the study, you must give a reason for your rejection or explain where the study needs to be revised.

REVIEW.APPROVE: The study is approved, and can be published.
REVIEW.DENY: The study is denied and thus closed.
REVIEW.HINT_TO_COMMENT: If you wish any modifications or reject the study, you should record the reason as a comment.

CONFIRM_DIALOG.WITHDRAW_APPROVAL_TITLE: Do you want to withdraw the approval request?
CONFIRM_DIALOG.WITHDRAW_APPROVAL_CONTENT:
If you withdraw your approval request, you can then process the study again.

However, you must then request approval of the study again so that the study can be reviewed.
CONFIRM_DIALOG.CLOSE_STUDY_TITLE: Do you really want to close the study?
CONFIRM_DIALOG.CLOSE_STUDY_CONTENT:
If the study is closed, no further research can be conducted on the data.

The study cannot be republished.

All selected researchers will also be informed that you have terminated the study.
CONFIRM_DIALOG.PUBLISH_STUDY_TITLE: Do you really want to publish the study?
CONFIRM_DIALOG.PUBLISH_STUDY_CONTENT:
After you publish the study, you can only edit the list of researchers.

All selected researches will also be informed, that you have published the study.
CONFIRM_DIALOG.DELETE_APPROVAL_TITLE: Do you really want to delete the query?
CONFIRM_DIALOG.DELETE_APPROVAL_CONTENT: The deletion of the query cannot be undone.
CONFIRM_DIALOG.APPROVE_STUDY_TITLE: Do you really want to approve the study?
CONFIRM_DIALOG.APPROVE_STUDY_CONTENT: After you have approved the study, the study coordinator can release the study, so that the researcher can start working on the study.

DATA_EXPLORER.CONFIGURATION_LOADING: The query configuration is beeing loaded. Please wait a moment.
DATA_EXPLORER.CONFIGURATION_ERROR: The query could not be compiled. Please open the configuration and try again.
